details.description: Cancel your driving theory test if you no longer need your appointment - you'll get a full refund if you give enough notice
details.more_information:
You'll need your provisional driving licence number.

% You’ll get a full refund if you give at least 3 clear working days’ notice. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days. %

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.
details.introduction: Cancel your driving theory test if you no longer need your appointment.
details.alternate_methods:
##Cancel by phone

You can cancel your test by calling the DSA.

$C
**DSA theory test bookings and enquiries**

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122  
**Welsh language:** 0300 200 1133  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm
$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

Book your theory test from £31 using this official theory test booking service - you'll need your provisional licence number and an email address to book online
